title: Fogboundbee

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 OC to write a story with another player, roleblocking them for the night.
- Use 2 OCs to attack another player.
- Use 3 OCs to provide basic defense to another player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 OCs every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
-For each Discordian that dies, you permanently gain one extra OC per night.
- For all intensive purposes, this is the Discordian beekeeper and should appear under ```=beekeeper```

desc:
Post 3458
*Caroline looks over at Yeet and gasps slightly.*
